name: Nursery
description:
Nursery

A nebula sandbox. Create stars from cosmic dust, crash comets into planets.

Requires a WebGL-capable browser and a decent GPU. Firefox recommended.

Nebulae

  • Drag cosmic dust to re-arrange the nebula.
  • Click and hold to collapse the dust into a new star.
  • Click a star to zoom into its solar system.
Solar systems

  • Click on planets or comets to zoom in. Click again to inspect.
  • Click an empty area to zoom out from a planet/comet.
  • Right-click and drag to rotate camera.
Comets

  • Comets are located on the outskirts of each solar system.
  • Each comet contains a certain type of chemical compound.
Impacts

  • Perturb comets and smash them into planets using the blue dial in the comet inspector.
  • The angle of impact will move a planet towards or away from its star.
  • The composition of the comet will be mixed into the target planet.
Planets

  • The appearance of a planet will be determined by its chemical composition and orbit.
  • A message will appear when a planet becomes habitable.
